snippet.title: Everdine Mini Trailer #2 [RPG Maker Horror Game]
snippet.description:
This is the second mini trailer I made for my small indie game Everdine - a lost girl's tale. 

It will release on November 18th 2022. 
Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1687710/Everdine__A_Lost_Girls_Tale/
Itchio: https://plueschkatze.itch.io/everdine

Everdine - A Lost Girl’s Tale is a short, atmospheric, fairy tale vibes RPG Maker horror adventure game.

Everdine finds herself lost in a forest of eternal twilight. Soon to be hunted by a mysterious beast, she will stumble across the remnants of others that came before her, and learn of a magical ritual that may be her only way out. 

Everdine is inspired by classic RPG Maker horror games, such as Ib, Witch's House, Mad Father, Pocket Mirror, etc. and folklore and fairy tales!



Music used in this trailer is by John Leonard French, from their music pack Complete Horror.
